column4: so i have run Jaunty live the past couple of days from a usb drive and liked it and had few problems with it.  is is ok to upgrade? i'm really getting tired of iitrepid locking up frequently
: what will you use it for ?
: UI found no major probs with the beta/alpha  jaunty, though I#d recommend you to backup your data-files in a sepaate location location in case of probs
